pages.text: Using the Mortar and Pestle, you can crush the blossoms from the trees of the Ornamental Forest, to create 9 different colors of pigments. $(br2) These pigments can be combined to form many colors, some of which will require Mica or Charcoal.

Pigments are used to create colored stains for wood blocks, and to color clay for blocks, bricks, and decorative vases. $(br2) Unlike Minecraft Dyes, these pigmants are more vibrant, so the color of your clay stays bright and true.
